segments.text: My aunt told me one of her secrets--cellophane tape .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just got it at the special health store . It's for my flabby arms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me know how it works .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to say , I have had enough of this roller coaster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . I'm like a yo-yo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Last week I was down to 60 kilos . This week I had one donut more . Now I'm up to 62 kilos .
segments.speaker: S2
